mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_user_advice (advice_type, contact, create_by, advice_content) VALUES (#{adviceType},#{contact},#{createBy},#{adviceContent})
mapper.select: SELECT a.`advice_id` AS adviceId,a.`advice_type` AS adviceType ,a.`advice_content` AS adviceContent, a.`contact`,a.`create_time` AS createTime FROM t_user_advice a ORDER BY a.`create_time` DESC
